fullText: The play works best when it focuses on the electric rivalry that defined both men's careers and transformed the NBA from a fringe sport into a global entertainment juggernaut.

bwwExcerpt: The attention-grabbing opening – with much fanfare accompanying the presentation of the six-member cast wearing tracksuits, in the style of NBA game starters – indicates a degree of sports-minded theatrical imagination at work.
